constraints.name: collision_limit
constraints.description: 每个粒子碰撞次数不超过 K 次后消亡

constraints.name: boundary_reflection
constraints.description: 粒子碰到边界时发生完全弹性碰撞，速度方向镜面反射，速度大小不变
constraints.formal: if particle collides with boundary at (x, y), new velocity = reflect(velocity, tangent(x, y))

constraints.name: independent_motion
constraints.description: 所有粒子的运动互不干扰
constraints.formal: ∀i, j, motion(i) is independent of motion(j)

constraints.name: initial_position_constraint
constraints.description: 初始位置在圆形区域内

constraints.name: non_zero_velocity
constraints.description: 每个粒子的速度向量非零
